description.short: Feel grateful. Send thnx! Get coffee
description.full: thnx! Gratitude App makes it easy to express feeling of gratitude. Send a note of thnx! to a colleague or a friend using the thnx! app inside Microsoft Teams - your recipient gets your note and a delicious cup of coffee from a network of thnx! activated cafes.\nTeams perform optimally when there are high levels of trust, and trust is built through recognition and gratitude. Thanking your staff once every 7 days builds optimal performance according to research from Gallup.
